name: Add3
shortDescription: A powerful no-code Web3 platform for creating and managing token products.
description: Add3 understands that creating your own crypto project is more then just token minting.  Manage an entire crypto life-cycle in Add3 from minting and vesting to liquidity pools and staking, all without code. Add3 allows anyone to create & manage the next best crypto project. Using Add3 you can save up to 1 year in development time, and save yourself the need to hire an engineer in the first place.
